They won't escape my grasp. Do you have any

text: Şüphe ettiğiniz birileri var mıdır Dündar Bey'im?
Hele bir Artuk Bey işini bitirsin...
english: until Artuk Bey finishes his work...
How are you, sir? I hope

text: En kötüsü bu olsun Artuk Bey.
english: this is the worst-case scenario, Mr. Artuk.

text: Obadayken karda yürüyüp, izimizi belli etmeyeceğiz Artuk Bey.
english: in the camp, we'll walk in the snow without leaving any footprints, Mr. Artuk.

text: Simon soysuzunu ele geçirene kadar ben ölüyüm Artuk Bey.
english: I'll be dead until you capture that scoundrel Simon, Artuk Bey.
They used Turgut as a tool. At

text: O vakit Turgut'un hayatı tehlikededir beyim.
english: that moment, Turgut's life is in danger, sir .
They can't get Turgut, Artuk Bey.
(Ertuğrul) Turgut will return to the tribe.
When (Ertuğrul) returns, beware of Dündar's wrath.

text: (Artuk) Sen hiç merak etmeyesin beyim. Hele Turgut bir obaya dönsün.
english: (Artuk) You don't need to worry at all, sir. Let Turgut return to the village first. I will

text: Dündar Bey'le de konuşup gerçeği anlatırım.
english: also speak with Mr. Dündar and tell him the truth.

text: ...sırrımızı açık eden bizden değildir Artuk Bey.
english: ...that whoever reveals our secret is not one of us, Mr. Artuk. Yes sir, as
Let them choose the best Alps.
We'll start the raid from here.

text: O da Süleyman Şah'ın oğlu. Çoktan kararını vermiş beyim.
english: He is also the son of Suleyman Shah. My lord has already made his decision. He
will not let your blood go unavenged.
(Dündar) We will strike like lightning on their heads!
...no head will be left on shoulders.
(Speaking one after another) I'll lead them
(Dündar) They have increased his security detail.

text: Her ne olursa olsun, o Turgut'u sağ isterim!
english: Whatever happens, I want Turgut alive!
(Bamsi) My lord, my lord, you speak well. Let

text: Hele alalım hele, o vakit tek tek sorarız beyim.
english: 's get them first, then we'll ask them one by one, sir.
My lord, my lord, I doubt myself...
...but I have no doubt that my brother Turgut

text: ...böyle bir şey yapacağından şüphe etmem beyim.
english: would do such a thing to our Ertuğrul Bey, my lord.

text: Beyim, beyim, Turgut Alp gelir beyim.
english: My lord, my lord, Turgut Alp is coming, my lord.

text: Dündar Bey'im. Dündar Bey, dinleyelim hele.
english: Mr. Dündar. Mr. Dündar, let's listen .

text: Hainse eğer, cezasını çeker elbet beyim.
english: If he is a traitor, he will certainly pay the price, my lord.
Whoever obstructs me in delivering the punishment of the traitor...

text: Dündar Bey'im, Turgut Alp'i sorgulamadan cezalandıramazsın.
english: Mr. Dündar, you cannot punish Turgut Alp without questioning him . Can someone who

text: Beyine ihanet edenden Alp mi olur?
english: betrays their master be considered an Alp?
can't know that without questioning, sir.

text: Sorgulayalım. Eğer hainse yularının kimde olduğunu öğreniriz.
english: Let's investigate. If he's a traitor, we'll find out who's pulling his strings.
Then, the finger cut off by Sharia law will not hurt. I

text: Ertuğrul Bey'in ölümü iki obayı da yasa boğdu.
english: Ertuğrul Bey's death plunged both tribes into mourning .
...you can't die with the dead, Aslıhan.

text: Biz yıkılmayacağız ki iki oba da ayakta kalsın.
english: We will not be destroyed, so that both villages can remain standing.
...I think about how Halime Hatun is doing...

text: Beyim, Ertuğrul Bey'in ölümü hepimizi sarstı.
english: My lord, the death of Ertuğrul Bey has shaken us all.
But it shook Aslıhan even more.
Especially when marriage is being discussed.
...on this difficult day, your duty is... ...to
stand by Halime Hatun and Hayme Hatun.

text: Babama bu meseleyi anlatmaya giderim abi.
english: tell my father about this, brother. It's

text: ...Ertuğrul Bey'in de ölümü sır dolu abi.
english: Ertuğrul Bey are shrouded in mystery, brother. They're

text: İkisi de aynı yaydan atılmış ok gibi.
english: both like arrows shot from the same bow.
What do you want to say, Aliyar?
But I have no doubt left, brother.
I have to tell my father, brother. It's
My Artuk Bey, my Artuk Bey!

text: Dündar Bey onu suçlar, elinden zor aldık.
english: Mr. Dündar accuses him; we had to forcibly take him away from him.
They're in a caged tent, act friendly.
How did you do this, Turgut?
How could you do this to my brother? To
my older brother, to my brain, to my sibling? Wow!
I've passed out of my world, sir.

text: Al canımı da bitsin bu çile.
english: Take my life too, so this suffering can end.
My lord, my lord! (Sound of a knife being drawn) I beg you, sir

text: Kurban olurum beyim, kardeşimizi de alma bizden.
english: , please don't take our brother from us too.

text: Beyim, ille birini öldüreceksen beni, beni öldür.
english: Sir, if you must kill someone, kill me, kill me.

text: Beyim, beyim dur hele beyim! Diyeceklerim var.
english: Sir, sir, wait a minute, sir! I have something to say.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imin son bir isteği vardır.
english: Ertuğrul Bey has one last request.

text: Hanın basılıp fitnenin def edilmesi lazımdır.
english: inn must be raided and the sedition eradicated . We'll

text: Alpleri de alıp, Adaklı Tepe’ye gideceğiz.
english: take the Alps with us and go to Adaklı Tepe .
Turgut Alp will also be coming with us.

text: Bu kutlu görevde hainin ne işi ola?
english: What business does a traitor have in this sacred mission? You'll find the

text: Aradığın her şeyin cevabını orada bulacaksın beyim.
english: answers to everything you're looking for there, sir .

text: Geldiğim günden beri bu meselenin peşindeyim baba.
english: this matter since the day I arrived, Dad.

text: Toktamış Bey'in ölümü sıradan bir ölüm değildir.
english: Toktamış Bey's death was no ordinary death . May

text: Ben de cesedin dilini kesip Artuk Bey'e götürdüm.
english: I cut off the corpse's tongue and took it to Artuk Bey .
After examining it, Artuk Bey said...
...that the owner of the tongue had died from poisoning, father.

text: Belli ki Toktamış Bey'i zehirleyen kirli eller...
english: Clearly, the same dirty hands that poisoned Toktamış Bey ...
But we have no choice but to learn.

text: Çünkü bu kirli eller gün gelir hepimize musallat olur baba.
english: Because these dirty hands will one day haunt us all, father.
...the order of the world is the same everywhere.
...betrayal a habit. They've come to begrudge

text: Yiğide mertçe ölümü bile çok görür olmuşlar.
english: even a brave man a dignified death .
...should I abandon the path I believe to be right?

text: Bir anına bile hükmedemediğimiz bu cihanda...
english: we cannot even control a single moment ... ...should
I give up the path I'm walking just to take one more breath?
(Ertuğrul) We chose the difficult path, Aktolgalı. There is
no easy death for us. There is no turning back from the
I know you can't bear it.
But it wouldn't be fitting for you, Halime, to be so distraught to your wife...
Now your pain is our pain, Hayme Ana. Thank
...Ertuğrul's pain has been added. And don't

text: Bir de sen içime ateş düşürme oğul.
english: you add another fire to my heart, son.
One person, just one person! We
spared his life, took him into our hands...

text: ...düşmana karşı kullanmayı amaçladığımız yalnızda bir kişi!
english: ...and intended to use him against the enemy— a single individual!
You were always right about Turgut, Philip.
... they know we set a trap for Turgut.

text: ...Alplerinin de kellesini alınca Kayıların sonunu merak ediyorum.
english: ...I wonder what will become of the Kayı tribe when they also take the heads of their Alps .
I displayed his corpse because I thought he was a traitor. I

text: Cenaze namazını dahi çok gördüm ona.
english: even begrudged him a funeral prayer.
how can I... live with this sin, Aliyar?
How can I face my Lord? I'm
not going to teach you, Dad.
...a person is not responsible for what they do not know.
How were we supposed to know he was poisoned?

text: Ahmed Fakih'le görüşüp, gereken neyse yapacağız baba.
english: We'll talk to Ahmed Fakih and do whatever is necessary, father.
We will also perform the funeral prayer.
Now, during these difficult times... we need to be
there for the Kayı people, father.
They know everything, sir. They won't take

text: Gayri Simon da tehdittir bizim için.
english: Simon is also a threat to us. Ah! It's all over
, it's finished now, it's over! The
time for my reign has come. The time has come for me to seize control of both

text: Obanın da, pazarın da iplerini elime geçirmenin vakti geldi.
english: the village and the market . Your
His reign is over now. I will not waste

text: ...onun o köhnemiş aklına biat ederek harcamayacağım.
english: ...by submitting to his outdated mindset . I can't
How will this happen, sir? I
will talk to the gentlemen and ask for a wedding feast.
They want plunder, they want war. The

text: Çavdar Tatarları, yiğit gibi yaşamak isterler.
english: Rye Tatars want to live like heroes .

text: Öyle, Farisi Tüccarlar gibi kilim satarak...
english: No, they don't want to become prostitutes by selling carpets like Persian merchants... What if

text: Baban toyu kabul etmezse? Ya Aliyar?
english: your father doesn't approve of the wedding? What about Aliyar? At
I will apply that custom they constantly talk about... I will crush them
If they'd let me, I'd rip your head off your body right here.
You've lived far too long, you traitor!

text: -Dur hele, dur, dur! -Yalan mı söyledim ha?
english: -Wait a minute, wait, wait! -Did I lie ? Would I
spread slander, Bamsi? Is it up

text: Sana mı kadı kim hain, kim sadık?
english: to you, judge, to decide who is treacherous and who is loyal? Of
also hold our master accountable? Be

text: Dikkat et de hesap sorayım derken borçlu çıkma.
english: careful not to end up owing money while trying to settle accounts .

text: Artuk Bey, ne demeye getirdin bizi buraya kadar?
english: Artuk Bey, why have you brought us all the way here?
What are we going to do here?
(Music - Upbeat) I seek refuge in Allah

text: Düşünde Ertuğrul Bey'imi atla gelirken mi görürsün kardeş?
english: In your dream, do you see Ertuğrul Bey coming on horseback, brother?

text: Kardeş ne gelmesi, ne gelmesi kardeş? Bu uçar, uçar kardeş!
english: Brother, what's coming, what's coming, brother? This thing flies, it flies, brother!
(Bamsi) My lord, my lord, is that you, my lord?

text: Elini ver de bir süreyim yüzüme.
english: Give me your hand so I can touch my face.
Thank goodness, sir. My name is
loyal and brave you are to your brothers...

text: ...Turgut Alp'im de o sadık ve yiğittir kardeşlerine.
english: ...my Turgut Alp is just as loyal and brave to his brothers.
...his intentions are not one. They lured

text: Turgut Alp'i beni zehirlemek için tuzağa düşürdüler.
english: Turgut Alp into a trap to poison me .
...while thinking he was doing us a favor...
...was actually carrying the devil's poison to us.
...there is something they haven't considered. No matter

text: Şeytan ne kadar tuzak kurarsa kursun...
english: how many traps the devil sets...
...they didn't account for the one who actually sets the traps.
it's time to bring their traps down on their own heads.
It is time to plunder the markets and burn the temples of those remnants of the Crusaders, the Templars.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
...bizi yok etmeye çalışan keçi çobanı barbarlar.

english: (Simon) Those who fall through the Mongol's sieve.
(Simon) For every life they take from us...
I will erase the name of the Kayı tribe from history. I
I will erase their names from history.
you and the mercy of Allah.
Peace and mercy of Allah be upon you.
Oh Lord. You are my representative
(Ertuğrul) We prostrate ourselves only to You...
(Ertuğrul) Oh God! Grant us the ability
to spread justice and mercy... and to put an

text: ...zalimin zulmüne son vermeyi bize nasip eyle.
english: end to the tyranny of the oppressor .
our battle be blessed, and may we be victorious.
I did things I shouldn't have done. Please

text: Vakit, şehit edilen kardeşlerimizin kanını alma vaktidir.
english: The time has come to avenge the blood of our martyred brothers .
campaign is ours now, but victory belongs to God.

text: Emrettiğiniz tüm tedbirler alınmıştır, Üstat Simon.
english: All the precautions you ordered have been taken, Master Simon.

text: Eğer Kayılar gaflete düşüp pazara saldırırlarsa...
english: If the Kayi tribe are foolish enough to attack the market ...

text: Artık Maria'yı toprağa verebiliriz, Üstat Simon.
english: We can now bury Maria, Master Simon.

text: Turgut'u öldürüp intikamını almadan kardeşimi kara toprağa vermeyeceğim.
english: I will not bury my brother until I have killed Turgut and avenged him.

text: Sen de ahaliye haber ver Bartalmay.
english: You should inform the people too, Bartalmay.
Moses' exiles who were skilled in trade.
Kayı tribe has attacked our market and our trade . Please

text: Bilinsin ki her türlü tedbir alınmıştır.
english: be aware that all necessary precautions have been taken.
You should also keep your eyes wide open.

text: Simon birazdan konuşma yapacaktır. Hadi toplanın, toplanın!
english: Simon will be giving a speech shortly. Come on, let's all gather!
I promised to protect your belongings... and your lives.
(Simon) And I am keeping this promise.
I've heard that the Kayi tribe...

text: ...ölen beylerinin intikamını almak bahanesiyle pazarımıza saldıracaklarmış.
english: ...are planning to attack our market under the pretext of avenging their dead leader.

text: ...Simon, uzak bozkırlardan gelen bu barbarlara müsaade etmeyecektir.
english: ...Simon will not tolerate these barbarians from the distant steppes. We will put an end to
(All together) God is the Truth! Ah! Ah!
Oh my God! (Sound of swords being drawn)
God is the truth! (Sound of sword drawing)
